scripts.apk:android: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd ..
scripts.aab:android: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease && cd ..
scripts.key:android: cd android/app && keytool -genkey -v -keystore my-release-key.keystore -alias my-key-alias -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000 && cd ../..
scripts.build:ios: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
